result.eng: We do not live in the the twentieth century any more!

result.eng: Now that the product exists, we must start marketing it.

result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.eng: We will be hugely thankful to you.

result.ga: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt

result.orig: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.html: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid go lár na caṫraċ ar an ḃus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.

result.eng: We said goodbye to each other for the night.
result.ga: D'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oíche
result.orig: D'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oíche
result.html: D'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oícheWe said goodbye to each other for the night.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág muid slán ag a ċéile don oíċeWe said goodbye to each other for the night.

result.eng: We depend on him for food all year round.
result.ga: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.orig: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.html: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ina ṁuinín fá ċoinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.
